channel.title: Visual Studio on One Problem Solved
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio on One Problem Solved

item.title: Visual Studio Shortcuts
item.description: Outlines Shortcut Description CTRL + M + O Collapse to definitions Ctrl + M, Ctrl + A Collapse all outlining Ctrl + M, Ctrl + S Collapse current region CTRL + M + L Expand all CTRL + M + P Expand all and disable outlining CTRL + M + M Collapse/expand the current section Windows Shortcut Description Ctrl+\, E View.
